projects.description: This website is an online database of actors and movies, which you can sort by genres, rating and popularity. Information about movies and actors was fetched from Movie DB.
Task Manager is a website for managing daily routines and tasks. User can add, delete and mark as completed tasks and boards.

Safe Place is a final project in Re:Coded Front End Web Development bootcamp that me and other 3 team members built within 4 weeks. This website targets to tackle problem of domestic violence against women in three ways: provide immidiate help, assist women in finding their psychological health and ensure their economic independency.

M.Y-Inventory is an inventory management system that was created during Innovation Hackathon. As a team of five, we had to solve problem of social enterprise, Tina-Zita, who was struggling with keeping track of inventory in her kitchen. This project won third place.
